Name: Occultus Command
About the game: The game is a side-scroller action platformer with fighting game type combos and assists. The game features: Local co-op; multiple power ups; training room to complete an optional tutorial; 90s comic book-style art; achievements; tough bosses; and a synth-hip hop infused soundtrack. You can switch between characters mid-combo and use other devastating team attacks. Player one can use the keyboard and player two can use the controller if only one controller is connected, or connect two controllers.
